item.title: About us
item.description: Intro We are an environmental DNA (eDNA) biomonitoring service based in Wellington, New Zealand. We specialize in biological water quality evaluation and the detection and monitoring of rare, cryptic and invasive species using new DNA sequencing technologies. In case you haven’t found the answer for your question please feel free to contact us.

item.title: Contact
item.description: wilderlab is owned and operated by Dr. Shaun Wilkinson, a molecular biologist and bioinformatician based in Wellington, New Zealand. Please feel free to get in touch with your biomonitoring requirements via email or phone (+64 210588068).
